short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leverage the capabilities of AI to instantly capture screenshots and translate manga, documents, and images into over 30 languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are many translator add-ons available, but they only work with plain website text. Our service can automatically detect the text within your screenshot image and efficiently provides the most accurate translation.

In our service, we employ Google Vision AI to automatically recognize texts within the image, and then utilize DeepL to deliver the most optimal translation.

Upon registration, you will receive an initial allocation of 50 coins to explore our service. Each coin allows you to perform one screenshot translation.
